title: Person of Interest | Down to the Second
author: eemersonm
comment: My God! You know what you've done? You create the best POI fan video !!! Incredibly emotional and touching. For four seasons there are so many events, but our team has always been able to get out of the most difficult situations. I miss for them so much. I think, you want to see a meeting of Root and Shaw as much as i want? :)
I love this Emilie! Now I just wanna go a rewatch all the episodes, hopefully we won't have to wait too much longer for new ones fingers crossed 😃
This is SO gorgeous! Such a great tribute to the show and I'm personally very happy to see so much focus on Carter :)
This was just incredible Emilie! Seriously loved the ending :D and also congratulations for the 9k subs <3
This show is so amazing and unique, and I'm so glad you made this, which is so beautiful it gave me chills!
description:
PLEASE WATCH IN HD

a simple tribute to our team machine. here's hoping we won't have to wait much longer to find out when they will return to us. in the meantime, if you haven't watched the show yet, all four seasons are now available on netflix.

song: down to the second by zach berkman
show: person of interest

p.s. happy root/shaw anniversary!
